name: Tio Tomás, A Contabilidade Dos Dias
summary: From Regina's personal and visual memories, a tribute to her uncle Thomas, a humble man with a simple and anonymous life. This is her acknowledgment how one does not have to be somebody to become exceptional in our life.
info:
• 中文名: 与托马斯叔叔的那些日子
  • 别名: Uncle Thomas, Accounting for The Days
  • 别名: Oncle Thomas, la comptabilité des jours
  • 导演: Regina Pessoa
  • 上映年度: 2019年
  • 片长: 13min
  • 语言: 葡萄牙语
  • 制片国家/地区: 葡萄牙 / 加拿大 / 法国
